refsynopsisdivinfo &refsynopsisdivinfo.purpose;
&refsynopsisdivinfo.synopsis.gen; Description
Like the other “info” elements, RefSynopsisDivInfo contains meta-information about the section of the document in which it occurs.
Processing expectations
&format.suppress; Many of the elements in this wrapper may be used in presentation, but they are not generally printed as part of the formatting of the wrapper. The wrapper merely serves to identify where they occur.
&FutureChanges;
DocBook DTDChanges for V4.0
AuthorBlurb and Affiliation will be removed from the inline content of RefSynopsisDivInfo in DocBook V4.0. A new wrapper element will be created to associate this information with authors, editors, and other contributors.
